description: Visualize OS metrics for Amazon RDS instance

panels.description: The percentage of CPU used by an Aurora DB instance
panels.title: CPU Utilization

panels.description: The number of client network connections to the database instance
panels.title: Database connections

panels.description: The amount of network throughput received from clients by each instance in the Aurora PostgreSQL DB cluster and the amount of network throughput sent to clients by each instance in the Aurora DB cluster
panels.title: Network Traffic

panels.description: The average number of deadlocks in the database per second
panels.title: Deadlocks

panels.description: The amount of available random access memory
panels.title: Freeable Memory

panels.description: The amount of swap space used
panels.title: Swap Usage

panels.description: The average number of disk I/O operations per second
panels.title: Disk Operations

panels.description: The average amount of time taken per disk I/O operation
panels.title: Disk Latency

panels.description: The number of outstanding read/write requests waiting to access the disk
panels.title: Disk Queue Depth

panels.description: The average number of bytes read/write from disk per second
panels.title: Disk Throughput

panels.description: The amount of Local Storage Available.
panels.title: Free Local Storage

panels.description: The minimum/maximum amount of lag between the primary instance and each Aurora DB instance in the DB cluster
panels.title: Replica Lag Minimum/Maximum

panels.description: For an Aurora replica, the amount of lag when replicating updates from the primary instance
panels.title: Aurora Replica Lag

panels.description: The amount of storage used by Aurora DB instance
panels.title: Volume Bytes Used

panels.description: The number of backup jobs in different states
panels.title: Backup Jobs

panels.description: The number of restore jobs in different states
panels.title: Restore Jobs

title: Amazon Aurora Metrics
